import React from 'react' import {Unit} from "./Unit" import {Upgrade} from "./Upgrade" export const Defender = ({unit, updaters, changeStats}) => { const [shieldsResearch, setShieldsResearch, armorResearch, setArmorResearch] = updaters const [setShields] = changeStats return
{setShields(1)}}>
{unit.base.shields ?

🧊: {unit.base.shields}

: "" }

❤️: {unit.base.health}

🛡: {unit.base.armor}
{unit.research.shields?
🧊 {shieldsResearch*unit.research.shields}
: <> }
🛡 {unit.base.armor + armorResearch*unit.research.armor}
}
